attributes.action: make PizzaTheHut a God, head of his own religion, and omnipotent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: PizzaTheHut needs to be recognised a s a god and head of his own religion, the religion itself wants recognition of its status to enable it to gain chARITY status.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
